nodes.text: Themor was the name given to two Gamma-class ATR-6 assault transports that were used by the Empire.

Tremor were part of a group of ships that were sent to retake ZA-13, a Deep Space Manufacturing Facility originally used to manufacture Hyperdrive engines for TIE Advanced fighters, that could also be mounted onto TIE Defenders. After driving of Zaarin's forces, Themor, which both carried troops, were to dock with the facility and deploy the troops into the factory then jump into Hyperspace after Java captured it.
